name: Smartwatch Pro X
description: Water-resistant smartwatch with heart rate monitoring and GPS tracking.

name: 4K Ultra HD TV
description: 55-inch 4K UHD Smart TV with HDR10 and integrated streaming apps.

name: Gaming Laptop G15
description: 15.6-inch laptop with Intel i7, 16GB RAM, RTX 4060, and 1TB SSD.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Adjustable lumbar support, breathable mesh back, and padded armrests.

name: Electric Toothbrush ProClean
description: Rechargeable toothbrush with 5 brushing modes and 2-minute timer.

description: Compact waterproof speaker with deep bass and 12h playtime.

name: Air Purifier Home 3000
description: HEPA filter air purifier for rooms up to 500 sq ft, removes 99.97% of particles.

name: Smart LED Light Bulb
description: Wi-Fi enabled bulb with voice control and adjustable color temperature.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated bottle keeps drinks cold for 24h or hot for 12h.

name: Wireless Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit keyboard with blue switches and rechargeable battery.
